languages.text: Теодора фон Валанциус и Эдельтрад мертвы, а {name} был{mf||а} провозглашен{mf||а} новым Вольным Торговцем. Новоиспеченн{mf|ого|ую} Лорд-капитана ждут новые испытания, теперь — у руля могущественной династии и протектората фон Валанциус.

traits.locale_text: Теодора фон Валанциус и Эдельтрад мертвы, а {name} был{mf||а} провозглашена новым Вольным Торговцем. Новоиспеченн{mf|ого|ую} Лорд-капитана ждут новые испытания, теперь — у руля могущественной династии и протектората фон Валанциус.

languages.text: Theodora von Valancius and Edelthrad are dead, and {name} has been declared the new Rogue Trader. The newly crowned Lord Captain will face new challenges at the helm of the powerful von Valancius dynasty and protectorate.
languages.original_text: Теодора фон Валанциус и Эдельтрад мертвы, а {name} был{mf||а} провозглашен{mf||а} новым Вольным Торговцем. Новоиспеченн{mf|ого|ую} Лорд-капитана ждут новые испытания, теперь — у руля могущественной династии и протектората фон Валанциус.

traits.locale_text: Theodora von Valancius and Edelthrad are dead, and {name} has been declared the new Rogue Trader. The newly-crowned Lord Captain will face new challenges at the helm of the powerful von Valancius dynasty and protectorate.

Theodora von Valancius and Edelthrad are dead, and {name} has been declared the new Rogue Trader. The newly crowned Lord Captain will face new challenges at the helm of the powerful von Valancius dynasty and protectorate.

Theodora von Valancius and Edelthrad are dead, and {name} has been declared the new Rogue Trader. The newly crowned Lord Captain will face new challenges at the helm of the powerful von Valancius dynasty and protectorate.

languages.text: Theodora von Valancius und Edelthrad sind tot, und {name} wurde {mf|zum neuen Freihändler|zur neuen Freihändlerin} ernannt. Den frisch gekrönten Lord Captain erwarten neue Herausforderungen an der Spitze der mächtigen Dynastie von Valancius und ihres Protektorats.
languages.original_text: Theodora von Valancius and Edelthrad are dead, and {name} has been declared the new Rogue Trader. The newly crowned Lord Captain will face new challenges at the helm of the powerful von Valancius dynasty and protectorate.

traits.locale_text: Theodora von Valancius und Edelthrad sind tot, und {name} wurde {mf|zum neuen Freihändler|zur neuen Freihändlerin} ernannt. Den frisch gekrönten Lord Captain erwarten neue Herausforderungen an der Spitze der mächtigen Dynastie von Valancius und ihres Protektorats.

languages.text: Théodora von Valancius et Edelthrad étant morts, {name} a hérité du titre de {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. {mf|Le nouveau seigneur-capitaine|La nouvelle seigneure-capitaine} fera face à des défis inédits aux commandes de la puissante dynastie von Valancius et de son protectorat.
languages.original_text: Theodora von Valancius and Edelthrad are dead, and {name} has been declared the new Rogue Trader. The newly crowned Lord Captain will face new challenges at the helm of the powerful von Valancius dynasty and protectorate.

traits.locale_text: Théodora von Valancius et Edelthrad étant morts, {name} a hérité du titre de {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. {mf|Le nouveau seigneur-capitaine|La nouvelle seigneure-capitaine} fera face à des défis inédits aux commandes de la puissante dynastie von Valancius et de son protectorat.

languages.text: 西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯与艾德萨德不幸遇难，{name}成为了新任行商浪人。这位刚刚接班的新任领主舰长将会克服无数新的挑战，指引强大的冯·瓦兰修斯王朝不断前进。
languages.original_text: Theodora von Valancius and Edelthrad are dead, and {name} has been declared the new Rogue Trader. The newly crowned Lord Captain will face new challenges at the helm of the powerful von Valancius dynasty and protectorate.

traits.locale_text: 西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯与艾德萨德不幸遇难，{name}成为了新任行商浪人。这位刚刚接班的新任领主舰长将会克服无数新的挑战，指引强大的冯·瓦兰修斯王朝不断前进。

languages.text: シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスとエデルスラドが死に、{name}が新たな自由開拓者として宣言された。新たに戴冠したロード・キャプテンは、強力なフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝と保護領の舵取りで新たな困難に直面することになる。
languages.original_text: Theodora von Valancius and Edelthrad are dead, and {name} has been declared the new Rogue Trader. The newly crowned Lord Captain will face new challenges at the helm of the powerful von Valancius dynasty and protectorate.

traits.locale_text: シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスとエデルスラドが死に、{name}が新たな自由開拓者として宣言された。新たに戴冠したロード・キャプテンは、強力なフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝と保護領の舵取りで新たな困難に直面することになる。

languages.text: Theodora von Valancius y Edelthrad han muerto y se ha nombrado a {name} Comerciante Independiente. {mf|El|La} nuev{mf|o|a} Lord Capitán tendrá que hacer frente a numerosos retos para dirigir la poderosa dinastía von Valancius y su protectorado.
languages.original_text: Theodora von Valancius and Edelthrad are dead, and {name} has been declared the new Rogue Trader. The newly crowned Lord Captain will face new challenges at the helm of the powerful von Valancius dynasty and protectorate.

traits.locale_text: Theodora von Valancius y Edelthrad han muerto y se ha nombrado a {name} Comerciante Independiente. {mf|El|La} nuev{mf|o|a} Lord Capitán tendrá que hacer frente a numerosos retos para dirigir la poderosa dinastía von Valancius y su protectorado.

languages.text: Theodora von Valancius ile Edelthrad öldü ve {name} yeni Hür Tacir ilan edildi. Çiçeği burnunda Lord Kaptan, kudretli von Valancius hanedanlığı ve protektorasının dümenine geçerek yeni zorluklara göğüs gerecek.
languages.original_text: Theodora von Valancius and Edelthrad are dead, and {name} has been declared the new Rogue Trader. The newly crowned Lord Captain will face new challenges at the helm of the powerful von Valancius dynasty and protectorate.

traits.locale_text: Theodora von Valancius ile Edelthrad öldü ve {name} yeni Hür Tacir ilan edildi. Çiçeği burnunda Lord Kaptan, kudretli von Valancius hanedanlığı ve protektorasının dümenine geçerek yeni zorluklara göğüs gerecek.
